row.entry: Third row from the right side in the middle. Two redeals are allowed.
Fourth row from the right in the middle, directly left of the stock.
Right eight piles. One card is already there at start. This is the base card. All fields have to be started with this card.
The group of cards in the middle of the table. Starts with 20 cards. Only the one top level card can be moved.
The four fields at the top and bottom, left and right of the plait. These are automatically refilled from the plait.
The eight fields left and right of the plait, between the edge fields. Only one card per pile is possible.

sect2.title: Ziel des Spiels
sect2.para: Verschieben Sie alle Karten auf die Fundamentstapel.

sect2.title: Regeln
sect2.para: All eight Foundations have to be started with the same card value. At the beginning you can choose whether to build up or down. You can take cards from the plait in the middle of the tableau, from the eight free fields left and right of the plait, from the four edges around the plait, and from the waste.
Das Spiel ist verloren, wenn keine Karten mehr zum Verschieben auf die Fundamentstapel verf√ºgbar sind und der Talon leer ist.

sect2.title: Punktwertung
sect2.para: Keine Punktwertung. Entweder gewinnen Sie oder Sie verlieren.

sect2.title: Strategie
sect2.para: Pick the cards from the plait as soon as possible as they are hard to free. Then pick the cards from the tableau as it will give you empty slots to temporarily store some cards.
